thread.section_title: AMOMA.com Bewertungen | Kundenbewertungen von AMOMA.com | www.amoma.com
thread.title: Sophie Bryant

author: Sophie Bryant
title: Sophie Bryant
text: We booked a nice Hotel in Paris through Amoma, we put in the right date, but when we saw the reservation, it was a different date. We have tried to contact Amoma and then they advised us to cancel ur booking only to leave us with no room and no money back... All we wanted was to change the dates of the booking, so we called the hotel ourself and they told us it would have been no problem to just change the dates, but by that time Amoma had already made us cancel the booking. BAD ADDVISMENT .. They make everything a problem when apparently it never was ..
